name: Tombsday
description:
This is a short prototype. You play a small green square called Zed, find powerups and stomp on goomba like enemies, try to survive the competition.

Tombsday is my first ever game project. The art and sprites are all produced by me as well as the sound effects courtesy of bfxr.net. The music is royalty free, I would like to produce my own when the core game is complete. The coding knowledge was provided by my college course in computing science. This is a fun first experience in making games and I hope my skills will improve as my experience grows. Appreciate any feedback.

Email me at: jakecampbell105@gmail.com

Jake Campbell
